stability.unstable: ðŸ”¬ This is a nightly-only experimental API.  (core_intrinsics)intrinsics are unlikely to ever be stabilized, instead they should be used through stabilized interfaces in the rest of the standard library

apiDescription: Creates a value initialized to zero.
init is unsafe because it returns a zeroed-out datum, which is unsafe unless T is Copy. Also, even if T is Copy, an all-zero value may not correspond to any legitimate state for the type in question.
